alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Germantown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Rossville, Williston, Lenow, Yum Yum, Taylor Chapel, Kirk and Hickory Withe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
